programme.title: Casper the Friendly Ghost - Casper the Friendly Ghost Ep8 - EP108
programme.desc: Depressed by the antics of the other ghosts, Casper leaves home to make friends. After unintentionally scaring several potential pals, Casper befriends two young children. They take him home, where Casper frightens their mother. Casper is again upset because he believes that he will always scare away his potential buddies. However, Casper scares away a banker who is coming to foreclose on the woman's house, and this wins her heart for Casper.

programme.title: Baby Einstein - Baby Neptune: Discovering Water
programme.desc: Within a baby's first year of life, new experiences can transform what might otherwise seem to be ordinary events into exciting opportunities for imaginative play. Baby Neptune™ exposes little ones to the wonders of water in their world -- whether they're stomping in the rain, splashing in the bathtub, playing "catch me if you can" with the tide on the beach, or "meeting" the fascinating creatures that live in rivers, lakes and oceans.

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Moral & Ethics - EP123
programme.desc: In this episode, we will go through everything related to Moral and Ethics. We will learn that morality helps us make good decisions and act responsibly all the time. We will also learn many valuable things about ethics and how to apply it in our lives, how it helps us to act in the right way and make good decisions. Being ethical means being respectful, honest, kind and trustworthy.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 6: Silent Mouth
programme.desc: The pressure builds on all fronts as Jason tries to close the case. Will Shelly be able survive as the pressure builds? The one option closed to her is to flee - she would never leave her children.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.

programme.title: Victim
programme.desc: Ukrainian immigrant Irina lives with her son Igor in a small Czech border town. When she discovers that Igor has been assaulted by three Romas her whole world comes crashing down. As times goes on, Irina begins to spot inconsistencies in his story.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (2)
programme.desc: With his colleague’s life on the line, Inspector Mehmet has to bust Thai crime boss Worawit out of jail. But an ambush by the Red Dragon gang leaves Worawit kidnapped and Mehmet injured and semi-conscious. How will Mehmet save his colleague now?

programme.title: From The Vine
programme.desc: A burnt-out executive experiences an ethical crisis and travels back to his hometown in rural Italy to recalibrate his moral compass.

programme.title: Home Front
programme.desc: Called up to fight in the Algerian war in 1960, four veterans are forced to confront their past more than forty years after they have returned to France. Despite keeping silent all this while, small events spark painful memories of their untold stories.

programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: Jeanny: The Fifth Girl
programme.desc: In a picturesque tiny town near Vienna, young girls have been vanishing without a trace for years. Jeanny has just fallen in love with a mysterious man. But when she notices signs of a dark side in him, she becomes suspicious. Will she be the next victim?

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Decisions In Athens
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet goes on an unofficial assignment abroad to help his ex-wife Sevim to track down her missing partner Steffen, an investigative journalist, and his kidnapped daughter Clara in the Greek capital Athens.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Sofia

programme.title: Invincible - Michael Phelps - EP1
programme.desc: From 2004 to 2008, Michael Phelps was invincible, rewriting the history of the Olympic Games.

programme.title: Invincible - Lewis Hamilton - EP2
programme.desc: Lewis Hamilton has been the dominant force in F1, winning four consecutive titles from 2017 to 2020 and has become the greatest victor in this sport.

programme.title: Invincible - Arsenal Invincibles - EP3
programme.desc: In 2003/04, Arsenal accomplished what many thought impossible, by remaining undefeated throughout the English championship.

programme.title: Invincible - Rafael Nadal - EP4
programme.desc: Nobody has dominated a grand slam like Rafael Nadal in the French Open… and in 2017, he achieved what everyone thought impossible, in triumphing for the 10th time in the Roland-Garros stadium.

programme.title: Invincible - Sir Donald Bradman - EP5
programme.desc: Throughout the history of sport, nobody has dominated like Sir Donald Bradman, whose number of runs scored in cricket was practically double that of all other world class players the game has produced.

programme.title: Invincible - Usain Bolt - EP6
programme.desc: The Jamaican Usain Bold erupted on the Olympic scene in 2008 and imposed himself on the track with an astonishing tally of three gold medals and three world records.

programme.title: Chill - Burton High Fives - EP22

programme.title: Foul Play - Wild Thing - EP23
programme.desc: Golfer John Daly is the "Wild Thing" of the fairways, Babe Ruth and Babe Dirikson encounter a trickster in a crazy golfing exhibition and Sergio Garcia's bad attitude.

programme.desc: The pioneers of women's sport, from Wilma Rudolph to Olga Kharlan.

programme.title: Invincible - Michael Schumacher - EP19
programme.desc: No F1 driver has dominated the motor racing scene like Michael Schumacher, who won five consecutive world titles starting from 2000.

programme.title: The Inside Line - Mick Schumacher - EP15
programme.desc: Mick Schumacher erupted into Formula 1 with Haas in 2021, with F2 and F3 titles in his pocket, thus proving his calibre.

programme.title: Flashpoint - Hingis vs Graf French Open - EP6
programme.desc: The 1999 French Open final between Martina Hingis and Steffi Graf and Michael Schumacher's 1995 season with Benetton have marked the history of sport.

programme.title: Baby Einstein - On the Go: Riding, Sailing and Soaring
programme.desc: As little ones become increasingly mobile, their fascination with all things that move intensifies too. On the Go Riding Sailing and Soaring exposes babies to the different ways people travel -- on land, by sea, and in the air -- while it presents them with captivating real-world images, funny puppet shows, and beautiful classical music by Beethoven, Haydn, Mozart and Rossini.

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Hope and Faith - EP124
programme.desc: In this episode, we will learn about the values of Faith and Hope. We will discover that hope is a value that allows us to believe that something positive will happen. Faith is having confidence in someone or something. When we have faith in people, we help them to believe in themselves. You must trust in yourself and know that you are capable of achieving it!

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Misha, the Purple Cat
programme.desc: Misha is a very lively, alert cat. She is very interested in investigating everything going on around her, which means she has some very entertaining adventures with her friends. programme.desc: Leo the Wildlife Ranger introduces the secrets and wonders of nature and wildlife around us and kickstarts a curiosity and passion for nature in kids. With engaging missions and adventures, kids have fun while learning positive lessons!

programme.desc: The show features Paula and her friends, Tim, Billy, Chalky, Calc, and the Numbers as they go on exciting adventures in colorful and exotic places. programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her family’s biggest fear is not her going to jail, it’s preserving their honour.

programme.title: Esteban
programme.desc: In Cuba, while helping his single mother sell black market beauty products, a 9-year-old boy dreams of becoming a pianist.

programme.desc: After recently losing her father, Clara discovers a passport, foreign bills and letters while going through his things. Suspecting that he is living a secret life, she embarks on a trip to Karakil, a lake in Tajikistan, to find out the truth.

programme.title: A Minute's Silence
programme.desc: In a small Baltic town, 18-year-old Christian and his teacher Stella fall for one another and begin a secret affair. However, the intensity of their feelings soon overwhelm them. When tragedy befalls Stella, Christian is forced to confront his first love.

programme.title: Vera Dreams of the Sea
programme.desc: Vera, a devoted wife, mother, and grandmother, has her serene life turned upside down by her husband's sudden suicide. As greedy relatives and an underworld scheme threaten their family’s home, she must confront danger and take control of her own fate.

programme.title: Aurora (2019)
programme.desc: Aurora, a commitment-phobic party animal, meets Iranian Darian one night at a hot-dog stand in Lapland. Darian is running from death and Aurora is running from love. They need each other to finally stop running.

programme.title: Khutulun: The Wrestling Princess
programme.desc: Princess Khutulun, a formidable Mongol warrior descended from Genghis Khan, has her marriage ambushed by an assassin who steals the Golden Sutra. Vowing revenge, Khutulun and her clan set out on an epic journey to retrieve the sacred text and restore peace.

programme.title: Lucky Girl
programme.desc: TV star Nina Sokil is diagnosed with bone cancer, but deeming her career to be more important with her health, Nina goes to absurd lengths to hide her condition so that she keeps working.

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: A River Within
programme.desc: Five women with their own personal struggles travel to the Orange River for their “Adventure Therapy”. When things go awry in their river rafting adventure, their survival instincts kick in forcing them to dig deep.
